profile:
Riverside Renos is a locally owned general contracting company serving the Greater Muskoka Area.  Our dedicated team is well versed in the lifestyle and the unique needs of the cottage community.  We offer a wide variety of services including the construction and installation of custom docks and decks, custom interiors, exterior additions and new construction. At Riverside Renos, you will work alongside our team who will help bring your vision to life, providing an upfront and detailed quote as well as an organized timeline for your project(s).  With a reputation that speaks for itself, our hardworking team is ready to fulfill your design dreams.     
                                                                                                                              
                  
Below are some of the services we offer:
          
• Custom Decks
• Custom Docks: Floating Systems, Pole Systems, Tower Dock Systems, Custom Aluminum Construction, etc.
• Custom Interiors: Basement, Kitchen, Bathroom, Flooring, etc.
• Exterior Additions
• New Construction
services: • Custom Decks • Custom Docks • Custom Interiors • Exterior Additions • New Construction and more!
specialities: Design and Build Custom Decks & Docks
